project_descr: This Readiness Proposal has been developed to define a strategic engagement framework with the Fund that helps strengthen the NDA and the country´s capacity to implement mitigation and adaptation actions

outputs.output_descr: This Readiness Proposal has been developed to define a strategic engagement framework with the Fund that helps strengthen the NDA and the country´s capacity to implement mitigation and adaptation actions. The proposal includes activities that will allow the NDA to build up national capacities and processes, engage different stakeholders in consulting and policy development processes, support access to finance, develop a country work program, and involve the private sector in climate change related projects and activities.
